arts.ttl: Atalanta vs. Lazio: vital points on the line
arts.sum: In the 66 official meetings in Bergamo between the two teams, the record stands at 26 Nerazzurri (Atalanta) wins, 29 draws, and 11 Lazio victories. Ivan Juric faced Lazio 6 times as a player with a record of 1 win for the Croatian manager, 1 draw, and 4 Biancocelesti victories.
